segments.script: üåü Ready for skin that glows from within? Rejuvenating Eye Cream is here!
segments.visual_prompt: Close-up of Rejuvenating Eye Cream with luxury packaging, soft golden lighting, elegant product display
Split screen showing skin concerns vs healthy glowing skin

segments.script: Meet Rejuvenating Eye Cream from Ethereal Glow! Reduces puffiness, dark circles, fine lines with our signature blend of Caffeine, hyaluronic acid, collagen boosters.
segments.visual_prompt: Product showcase with ingredients floating around, hands applying Rejuvenating Eye Cream, satisfying texture shots
Happy customers, before/after results, 5-star reviews animation, testimonial graphics

segments.script: Ready to glow? Visit TheRealGlow.in now! Use code GLOW20 for 20% off!
segments.visual_prompt: Website URL display, discount code animation, final product glamour shot

segments.script: Why Rejuvenating Eye Cream works: Our organic formula is clinically tested and dermatologist approved. Perfect for Delicate eye area needing specialized care.
segments.visual_prompt: Ingredients breakdown, scientific graphics, dermatologist approval badges

segments.script: Don't wait! Transform your skin today. Visit TheRealGlow.in, use code GLOW20 for 20% off. Subscribe for more skincare secrets!
segments.visual_prompt: Subscribe button animation, discount code, product collection display
